author: Dominick Meglio
releaseNotes:
Added support for assigning tags to a package to make searching easier
Unified the UI so that it works the same way whether you are searching for a package or browsing by tags.
Results will show up to 5 tags associated with a package.
All packages are shown in the results, even ones you have installed. They will have a checkmark shown instead of a download icon.
Fixed bugs related to beta releases not updating properly.
Fixed a bug when a new optional driver was added to an existing package.
Tags and categories are now validated. So if one isn't in the supported list it will NOT show up.
Added a primary app option which allows a package author to automatically launch an app after installing a new package.
Added the ability to remove custom repositories.
You now receive a notification when a new repository is added so you can do a Match Up.
